title: Elon Musk sells $10 million in flamethrowers in four days
text:
Elon Musk sells $10 million in flamethrowers in four days 12:01am GMT - 02:00 
A handful of tweets and four days later, Silicon Valley billionaire Elon Musk has closed orders for his latest novelty product, after selling 20,000 flamethrowers at $500 a piece. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A handful of tweets and four days later, Silicon Valley billionaire Elon Musk has closed orders for his latest novelty product, after selling 20,000 flamethrowers at $500 a piece.
